name: The Sinking Bar
description:
The Sinking Bar DEMO Storyline

A family feud between two bars, The Shakesbeer and The Inglorious Bar-Star, has been raging for generations. The two share a very small moon that orbits a planet.

You are the great-great-great-grandchild of the founders and you get hired at the other family's bar, The Inglorious Bar-Star, with the goal of ruining it and putting an end to the feud that has gone on for too long and has shed too much blood, tears, guts, and a lot of other not-so-pretty things!

How to play

During a shift, you have to serve the maximum amount of customers that you can. Respect their cocktail order by pouring the correct drinks in the correct order into their glass. Add poison without being seen to get closer to your goal of sinking your rivals business! In order for a customer to be poisoned by a cocktail, you have to serve the right order, otherwise they won't drink it! 

Each day, earn enough money to keep your job and your boss's doubts low, but don't forget to poison enough drinks to lower the customer pool and the bar reputation. You don't want to help your rivals, do you?

This is a demo. We will continue to work on the game later to create a full campaign, and probably an endless mode.
